actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to repeal provisions of title 10, United States Code, which imposes certain restrictions on enlisted members of the armed forces and on members of military bands.

summary.text: Removes the present restrictions which prohibit enlisted members of the armed forces on active duty from engaging in a civilian pursuit or business or prohibit members of the Army, Navy, Air Force, or Marine bands from receiving remuneration for furnishing music outside of a military base where such activities are in competition with local civilians.

titles.title: A bill to repeal provisions of title 10, United States Code, which imposes certain restrictions on enlisted members of the armed forces and on members of military bands.
